pts_avg_l5: Average points scored in the last 5 games (more is better).
reb_avg_l5: Average rebounds in the last 5 games (recovering the ball after missed shots).
ast_avg_l5: Average assists in the last 5 games (passes leading to a score).
tov_avg_l5: Average turnovers in the last 5 games (lower is better; turnovers are lost possessions).
fg_pct_avg_l5: Average field-goal percentage (overall shooting accuracy) in the last 5 games.
fg3_pct_avg_l5: Average 3-point percentage in the last 5 games.
ft_pct_avg_l5: Average free-throw percentage in the last 5 games.
winrate_l5: Win rate in the last 5 games (0 to 1).
rest_days: Days since the previous game (more rest can help).
opp_pts_avg_l5: Opponent average points scored in the last 5 games.
opp_reb_avg_l5: Opponent average rebounds in the last 5 games.
opp_ast_avg_l5: Opponent average assists in the last 5 games.
opp_tov_avg_l5: Opponent average turnovers in the last 5 games.
opp_fg_pct_avg_l5: Opponent average field-goal percentage in the last 5 games.
opp_fg3_pct_avg_l5: Opponent average 3-point percentage in the last 5 games.
opp_ft_pct_avg_l5: Opponent average free-throw percentage in the last 5 games.
opp_winrate_l5: Opponent win rate in the last 5 games.
star_pts_avg_l5_sum: Sum of last-5 scoring averages for the team’s top 3 in-form players.
star_min_avg_l5_avg: Average minutes (last 5 games) for the team’s top 3 in-form players.
star_pm_avg_l5_avg: Average plus/minus (last 5 games) for the team’s top 3 in-form players.
opp_star_pts_avg_l5_sum: Same as star_pts_avg_l5_sum but for the opponent.
opp_star_min_avg_l5_avg: Same as star_min_avg_l5_avg but for the opponent.
opp_star_pm_avg_l5_avg: Same as star_pm_avg_l5_avg but for the opponent.
